content.eamr: ( ing-11 "1 cup confectioners' sugar for rolling" )

content.text: 0) Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "the oven"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "325 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "165 degrees C"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Grease and flour a 9x13 inch baking pan.
2) In a large bowl, beat eggs and sugar until thick and pale.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "beat"@20:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "eggs"@25:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "sugar"@34:39 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until thick and pale"@40:60 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt, cloves, cinnamon and allspice; blend into the egg mixture along with the vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Sift"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the flour"@17:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "baking powder"@28:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@43:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cloves"@49:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "cinnamon"@57:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "allspice"@70:78 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "blend"@80:85 / AC
		:ppt ( "the egg mixture"@91:106 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "the vanilla"@118:129 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Finally fold in the chopped figs and walnuts.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "fold in"@11:18 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "the chopped figs"@19:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "walnuts"@40:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Pour the batter into the prepared pan and spread evenly.
6) Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly toasted.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "20 to 25 minutes"@12:28 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "the preheated oven"@32:50 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until lightly toasted"@52:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) When cool, cut into squares and roll the squares in confectioners' sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( cond-7-0 "When cool"@3:12 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "cut"@14:17 / AC
		:reshape ( "squares"@23:30 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "roll"@35:39 / AC
		:ppt ( "the squares"@40:51 / FOOD )
		:loc ( "confectioners' sugar"@55:75 / FOOD )
	)
)
